::Windlord::
    He fired another 25 shots at BH.

::Aerotaur::
    He ran out of the base after Nightlight.  "Nightlight?  I thought you 
were feeling ill?"  He spots the standoff between Windlord and Burning Hammer 
when something occurs to him.  "HEY ASSASSIN!  You remember that femme bot 
you came with before?  We've got her locked up so deep in the base you'll 
never find her unless you let Trinity go.  Now!"
